Nice To Have You Here!

Welcome to my world! My name is Diana Pavlova /Doshky/. Doshky is my artistic nickname given to me by a very dear family I met in UK. I spent almost nine years in Great Britain and there I discovered my love of painting.

  • Work
  • About
  • Contact

Doshky

A self taught brush artist happy to contemplate falling snowflakes in the winter, dry leafs on the wind in the autumn or a kid running in chase of an ant in the summer for hours.

Paintings

Open navigation Close section
A few words

About Me

I am a self taught artist and I love to paint things that take me to a strange and colourful world. This is my way to express myself and in every painting I create I put a little piece of my heart and my colourful thoughts.

Open navigation Close section

and share anything that comes to mind, I'd appreciate your question, opinion or suggestion.
